name: UdiconnectPlus
0:
”Alexa, close Bedroom curtain.”
”Alexa, what is the position of Bedroom curtain?”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Udiconnect Plus allows you to control your motorized curtains with Udinese controllers. Udiconnect Plus is a safe Skill developed by ASSA ABLOY so that you can interact with the curtains in your home through Alexa: with short voice instructions you can open, close, check the status, and place all the curtains in the desired position.
 
To pair your curtain with Alexa, you must have previously installed the Udinese controller using the Udiconnect Plus app. Then make the account linking following the Skill instructions and thus you will be able to manage the curtain installed in your home:

• To close your curtain, say, "Alexa, close the curtain Bedroom."
• To find out the status, you can say, "Alexa, what is the position of Bedroom curtain?"

Your devices are identified as you named them in Udiconnect Plus app, we suggest you use simple names for a better experience.
You can ask Alexa to open or close individual blinds, or trigger a scene that moves a group of blinds to preset positions.

If you need help setting your devices and Udiconnect Skill, call 0800 580 4443 or write us through our website: https://www.udinese.com.br/pt-BR/site/udinesecombr/contato/
 
Download Udiconnect Plus app for Android and iOS:
https://play.google.com/store/search?q=Udiconnect&c=apps&hl=pt-BR
https://apps.apple.com/br/app/udiconnect/id1206051552
 
The entire Udiconnect platform is protected by ASSA ABLOY's stringent home security standards.
 
You can check product compatibility and availability at: https://www.udinese.com.br/
